data.title: North Carolina Board of Law Examiners
data.meta_description: Board of Law Examiners of the State of North Carolina
data.text:
NCBE Number:

You must supply your NCBE number. NCBE Number must be less than 64 char. NCBE Number must be alphanumeric characters. NCBE Number must start with N followed by 8 digits. NCBE number is not matching with your information. Please check your NCBE number.

We primarily communicate with applicants electronically rather than through the mail. It is your responsibility to:

Maintain at all times a current email address on your personal North Carolina Board of Law Examiners registration page. Please make certain you use an email address that is unique to you and not shared by others.

Add noreply@ncble.org to your email address book and ensure our emails are not filtered as spam.

Regularly read all email.

Regularly visit our web page.

You are charged with knowledge of all communications sent to the email address you provide on your personal North Carolina Board of Law Examiners registration page and of all announcements and information posted on our website.
